ResearchProjectDef.label: Glass making
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to make glass in ovens that can withstand high temperatures.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Corned beef
ResearchProjectDef.description: Meat product obtained by long-term aging of meat in table salt. The process of getting corned beef is called salting. Salting is a possible type of long-term storage of meat at positive temperatures.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Lessons from the past
ResearchProjectDef.description: Living in harmony with nature was not easy. Your ancestors have come a long way to what you have now.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Tribal clothing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Simple, shabby clothing can help you get through bad weather.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Simple wood processing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Basic knowledge of wood will allow you to use them for the production of various materials.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Fishing I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to fish with primitive traps.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Fishing II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn new ways to fish.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Cooking I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Time to experiment! Start creating your own recipes to satisfy your needs.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced wood processing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn new ways of working with wood and learn how to create new structures.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Instruments I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to create the simplest tools to make your job easier.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Instruments II
ResearchProjectDef.description: It is much more convenient to work with strong tools than with simple natural counterparts. Learn to create easy-to-use tools for the job.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Prosthetics I
ResearchProjectDef.description: In a world full of danger, limbs can be easily lost. It is worth considering a primitive alternative.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Prosthetics II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to make simple mechanical limb prostheses.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Games I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Work is work, but you also need to be able to have fun! Create simple ways to cheer up your settlers.

ResearchProjectDef.label: First alcohol
ResearchProjectDef.description: You need to be able to relax. Learn to make berry wort as the simplest fermentation product. In addition, learn how to create special fermentation barrels.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Distillation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Explore the fermentation process in more detail to discover the possibilities of distillation.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Wooden floors I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Stop walking on cold ground! Your knowledge of woodworking opens up the possibilities of wood flooring for you.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Floor decoration I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Try decorating the floor with something to create a cozier atmosphere. Learn to create simple rugs.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Floor decoration II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to create beautiful and soft rugs to create coziness.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Furniture I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Sleeping on the ground is bad for your health. Learn to Build Simple Furniture for Basic Comfort.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Simple hygiene
ResearchProjectDef.description: Keeping your body clean is essential for survival.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Simple stone processing
ResearchProjectDef.description: The first steps in stone processing. Learn to create sculptures, break stone debris into building materials.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Blacksmithing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Processing of minerals to obtain metals.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Primitive metal processing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Getting metals is half the trouble! Learn to craft simple metals for simple tools, weapons.

ResearchProjectDef.label: World and you
ResearchProjectDef.description: It's time to leave their native lands and see what is there, behind the fence...

ResearchProjectDef.label: Mysticism and rituals
ResearchProjectDef.description: Give your buildings a little mysticism and meaning.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Cooking II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Now is the time to seriously consider providing yourself with delicious and nutritious food. Discover new ways to handle food.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Simple armor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to craft leather armor for increased protection.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Primitive bows
ResearchProjectDef.description: Face-to-face combat is dangerous, so learn to kill enemies from a distance.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Improved bows
ResearchProjectDef.description: New types of bows will allow you to deal more damage and hit targets at an even greater distance.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Primitive defense
ResearchProjectDef.description: Wild animals and hostile people constantly threaten your safety, but you can try to hide from these misfortunes.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced defense
ResearchProjectDef.description: People and animals are not scary when you are behind a stone wall or palisade. Probably...

ResearchProjectDef.label: Production I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Technology moves your life forward by helping you cope with adversity. Keep up the good work, or fall in front of them.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced stone processing
ResearchProjectDef.description: By improving the skills and knowledge gained, you will be able to use the stone even more efficiently.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Stone floors I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to lay stone floors.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Stone floors II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to lay more stone floors.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Metallic floors I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Coating composed of metal plates or cast plates.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Stone floors III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to lay more stone floors.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Joinery
ResearchProjectDef.description: Upgrade the production of wood components and items.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Wooden floors II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Explore new ways to install wood floors.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Weaving
ResearchProjectDef.description: Create a primitive machinery for the production of fabrics from plant materials.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic health care
ResearchProjectDef.description: Nursing is an essential element in the survival of your community.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Simple health care
ResearchProjectDef.description: Let the doctors at this time be pretty crazy, but even so, you have more chances to survive than without their help.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Furniture II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Assembly technology for simple and comfortable furniture using bed linen.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Ergonomics I
ResearchProjectDef.description: It's good when all the necessary tools are in place. Learn to craft handy sets of items for the craft.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Storage I
ResearchProjectDef.description: It's handy to have the materials you need on hand, isn't it? Learn to create simple and spacious storages.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Storage II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to create more secure storage structures.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Storage III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to create more secure storage structures.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Storage IV
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to create more secure storage structures.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Exquisite furniture
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to assemble beautiful furniture worthy of kings!

ResearchProjectDef.label: Monuments I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to build natural monuments to decorate the settlement.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Monuments II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Deepen your knowledge in the construction of majestic monuments.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Monuments III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to build magnificent monuments.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Games II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to have fun with mind games.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Cooking III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn new ways to cook delicious food.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Preserving
ResearchProjectDef.description: Are you tired of food spoiling too quickly? Perhaps you should turn to canning to preserve them for years to come?

ResearchProjectDef.label: Beekeeping basics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Have you been stung by a nasty bee again? It seems time to pacify them and make them work for you.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Alchemy
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn the basics of alchemy by learning how to create primitive potions and gunpowder.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Combustible mixtures
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to synthesize hazardous combustible mixtures from sulfur, crude oil, or other products.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Architecture
ResearchProjectDef.description: The emergence of new ways of storing information, the discovery of new materials makes it possible to create more complex structures.

ResearchProjectDef.label: EquipmentModification
ResearchProjectDef.description: So, you have a good understanding of the basic armor templates. How about trying to change them for yourself?

ResearchProjectDef.label: Weapons I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Technology for creating new types of weapons.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Weapons II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Technology for creating new types of weapons.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Sewing simple clothes
ResearchProjectDef.description: Creation of simple and comfortable clothes from fabrics.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Linen fabrics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Technology for sewing linen-based fabrics. The fabrics are elegant and lightweight.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Silk
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to create soft and delicate silk fabrics.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Basics of mechanic
ResearchProjectDef.description: Labor mechanic is the first human achievement in the field of production optimization.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Mechanical mills
ResearchProjectDef.description: Are you tired of using manual labor in such a common thing as making flour? You seem to have found a great solution to this question.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Gemstone processing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Gain knowledge for gemstone processing.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Improved ore mining
ResearchProjectDef.description: The ever-increasing demand for metals requires more optimal methods of obtaining ore.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Safety engineering
ResearchProjectDef.description: Compliance with safety measures will protect your means of production from destruction, and workers from disability.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced quarry design
ResearchProjectDef.description: Upgrade underground track tunnels to avoid frequent collapses.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced mines ventilation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Install ventilation ducts inside mine tunnels to avoid poisoning and gas explosions.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Improved ore processing
ResearchProjectDef.description: The correct approach to ore processing will allow you to get more resources while saving them.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Assault weapons
ResearchProjectDef.description: Cannonballs and huge arrows. A great addition to the assault army.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Guns fire
ResearchProjectDef.description: The smell of gunpowder and the rumble of shots are what accompanies the appearance of cannons on the battlefield.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Medium guns
ResearchProjectDef.description: Medium and slow guns designed to siege or attack infantry.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Heavy guns
ResearchProjectDef.description: Heavy and slow guns designed to siege or attack infantry.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Modified guns
ResearchProjectDef.description: Specific heavy gunpowder guns.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Production II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Technology has dramatically advanced your life, paving the way for accomplishment. Don't stop in your knowledge.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Primitive weapons
ResearchProjectDef.description: Ancient and time-tested weapons.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Simple weapons
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to forge simple blades to arm the militia.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Blunt weapon
ResearchProjectDef.description: Don't have funds to break through your armor? Try to use stunning techniques and break the bones of the enemy.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Heavy leather armor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Protect your body with durable leather armor. It will not save you from a strong blow, but at least it will prevent you from chopping off your limbs instantly.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Chain armor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Protect your body from slashing sword strikes with a chainmail layer of armor.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Fertilizer production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to create powerful biological fertilizers to significantly increase soil fertility.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Archeology
ResearchProjectDef.description: While wandering around the world, you might stumble upon bizarre bones or remains of ancient civilizations. It is worth exploring this in more detail and getting the maximum benefit.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Architectural engineering
ResearchProjectDef.description: Start designing and building more complex and complex structures.
